title: Ecce Homo; engraving by Cornelis Cort, after a drawing by Etienne DuPerac (1525-1601).
description: On a podium stands Christ between four men. In foreground, spectators; at left, the cross held by a man. The city gate and two houses in background. Inscribed, right (on podium): "Corn. Co. F. 1572."
name: Print
